content: Xiao Han is a Ph.D. student at University of Surreyunder the supervision of Prof. Tao Xiang. He obtained his bachelor’s degree at Zhejiang Universityin 2020. He has several academic experiences at University of Michigan, Westlake Universityand Fudan University.
summary: Xiao Han is a Ph.D. student at University of Surreyunder the supervision of Prof. Tao Xiang. He obtained his bachelor’s degree at Zhejiang Universityin 2020. He has several academic experiences at University of Michigan, Westlake Universityand Fudan University.
title: Xiao (Brandon) Han

authors: _Xiao Han_* | Kam Woh Ng* | Sauradip Nag | Zhiyu Qu
summary: The second place solution for 2nd eBay eProduct Visual Search Challenge (FGVC9-CVPR2022).
title: Large-Scale Product Retrieval with Weakly Supervised Representation Learning

authors: Xiao Han | Licheng Yu | Xiatian Zhu | Li Zhang | Yi-Zhe Song | Tao Xiang
summary: A versatile and flexible framework for fashion-focused V+L representation learning.
title: FashionViL: Fashion-Focused Vision-and-Language Representation Learning

authors: Xiao Han | Sen He | Li Zhang | Yi-Zhe Song | Tao Xiang
summary: A unified framework and benchmark for two interactive garment retrieval tasks.
title: UIGR: Unified Interactive Garment Retrieval

authors: Xiao Han | Sen He | Li Zhang | Tao Xiang
summary: Solve the data scarcity problem in TBPS through transfer learning and contrastive learning.
title: Text-Based Person Search with Limited Data

authors: _Xiao Han_* | Ziyang Fan* | Zeyang Liu* | Chao Li | L. Jay Guo
summary: Interdisciplinary AI application in metasurface designing.
title: Inverse Design of Metasurface Optical Filters Using Deep Neural Network With High Degrees of Freedom
